title: Monday Morning Confessions + Amy's Shady Crossing Guard + Lunchbox Pranks Businesses
itunes:title: Monday Morning Confessions + Amy's Shady Crossing Guard + Lunchbox Pranks Businesses
description:
Listeners call in and confess to something they've been keeping secret. Amy thinks her neighborhood crossing guard is dealing drugs through car windows. Lunchbox calls random businesses pretending to be an employee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
